Subject: Welcome to our Newsletter
Body: Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter. Stay tuned for exciting updates!

Subject: Introduction to the Team
Body: I'd like to introduce you to our team members. They are a talented group!

Subject: Urgent: System Failure
Body: We are experiencing a critical system failure. Please take immediate action.

Subject: Maintenance Notice
Body: We will be performing routine maintenance tonight. Minimal impact is expected.

Subject: Action Required: Review Proposal
Body: Please review the attached proposal and provide your feedback by the end of the week.
